description: This tool links to a proper list of MSP files for Office 2016, which can be useful for patch management and deployment processes. By accessing this list, system administrators can streamline their update and deployment tasks for Office applications. The provided link directs users to the official Microsoft documentation that outlines the relevant updates and files necessary for management. Utilizing this resource helps maintain up-to-date software environments and assists in troubleshooting potential issues arising from outdated or missing files.
